channel.title: spa on Aashish Koirala
channel.description: Recent content in spa on Aashish Koirala

item.title: Listor- Showcasing React and .NET Core
item.description: For both React and for .NET Core (specifically ASP.NET Core and Entity Framework Core), I got sick of playing around with little prototypes and decided to build an application. Listor is my first proper application I have built using both these technologies. It is a simple list-maker application- nothing fancy. But I have been using it since I put it up and it has come in handy quite a bit.

item.title: The New Way Forward for SPAs with Angular and React
item.description: Having worked with Angular 1.x for some time and having liked it quite a lot (I guess that one we’re supposed to call AngularJS, and the new one is just Angular - yes, that is not confusing at all, is it?), I must say I was quite spooked when I first saw the documentation for the new Angular. It indeed is a completely different framework. There is no easy migration path from AngularJS short of a rewrite, at which point you might as well evaluate all your options including React.
